All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.core.ensure.EnsureTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.function.ResultTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.language.trait.LanguageTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Broadcaster, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Listener, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.MessageTransceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Repeater, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.repeaters.RepeaterMixin, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Transceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.core.project.ProjectTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.registry.RegistryTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.vm.JavaTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Receiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Transmitter, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Nameable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.NamedObject, com.telenav.kivakit.mixins.Mixin, com.telenav.kivakit.resource.packages.PackageTrait, org.junit.rules.TestRule
public abstract class KryoUnitTest extends UnitTest
Adds Kryo serialization testing to the UnitTest base class. Serialization of objects can be tested with:
  • testSerialization(Object)
  • testSerialization(Object, Version)
  • testSessionSerialization(Object)

The registered types used by these methods can be specified by overriding kryoTypes().

Author:
jonathanl (shibo)

  • Method Details

    • kryoTypes

      protected KryoTypes kryoTypes()
      Returns the kryo types for this unit test. By default this is the kivakit-core types and the kivakit-resource types.

    • session

      protected com.telenav.kivakit.serialization.core.SerializationSession session()
